name: Zombie Shooter 3D (smart545)
description: I present to your attention Zombie Shooter 3D. Huge arsenal of weapons and interesting gameplay! Repel Zombie Attacks. Earn money. Replenish your Arsenal. - A rich arsenal of various weapons from Pistol to AK-47 - Weapon Upgrade - Realistic Shooting Physics - 2 Maps to choose from - Beautiful graphics - Quality sound - Unity engine
